name: Shrimp and Crab Macaroni Salad
author: Fred
summary: A cool main dish seafood salad for hot summer days using small salad shrimp and either imitation or real crabmeat.
ingredients: ½ pound fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with cold water
Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat
Cover and let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes
Remove eggs from hot water and let cool
Peel eggs and reserve 1 egg for the garnish
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain
In a large mixing bowl, combine macaroni, eggs, celery, onion, green pepper, shrimp and crab
In a separate mixing bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, milk, dill, mint, salt, sugar, cocktail sauce and hot pepper sauce
Pour the dressing mixture into the macaroni mixture and mix thoroughly
Sprinkle top with paprika and decorate with extra sliced egg
Seal the bowl with plastic wrap and chill for 4 to 6 hours
